main event: A witness in Phoenix, Arizona reported seeing a bright light in the sky that maneuvered rapidly and then disappeared on November 6, 1959.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 30 seconds.
The witness could not determine the exact size, shape or altitude of the object.
The witness stated the object moved with great speed and in a smooth, controlled manner.
The witness estimated the object to be the size of a small airplane based on comparing it to a half dollar held at arm's length.
The witness was unable to get a photograph of the object as their camera was not working.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
